task: Develop a basic 'Advanced Wars' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Short circuit'.
name: Battle Circuit

branding_data.short_description: A tactical turn-based strategy game with a unique 'short circuit' mechanic.
branding_data.detailed_description: Battle Circuit is a turn-based strategy game inspired by the classic 'Advanced Wars' series. Players command various military units across grid-based maps, engaging in tactical battles to outmaneuver and defeat their opponents. The game introduces a unique twist with the 'short circuit' mechanic, allowing players to disrupt enemy communications and temporarily disable their units, adding an extra layer of strategic depth. Each battle requires careful planning, resource management, and clever use of the environment to achieve victory.
